lines.text: GEOFFREY C. BIBLE
CHAIRMAN AND CEO
PHILIP MORRIS COMPANIES
REMARKS AT THE BUSINESS FORUM
PHILIP MORRIS INVITATIONAL
FEBRUARY 18, 1996
Good afternoon...and welcome to the Business Forum. I'm delighted that so many
of you could join us.
In a few minutes, we're going to hear presentations by Jim Morgan, President and
Chief Executive Officer of Philip Morris USA..Bob Morrison, Chairman and CEO of
Kraft Foods.….and Jack MacDonough, Chairman and CEO of Miller Brewing
Company. There also will be plenty of time for everyone to ask questions.
As we've done over the past few years, we are going to use the questions you have
already submitted, together with any additional questions you write on the cards
placed on your chairs, to get the question and answer period started.
Steve Parrish will be our moderator for the Q & A period. Steve will select cards at
random and put the questions to the panel. We'll also take questions from the
floor.
Once again, if you include your name on your question cards, we will make sure
that someone gets back to you in the next few days, if we don't answer your
questions during today's session.
(Pause)
